title: AI Note Assistant
summary: Live handwriting analysis with intelligent pop-ups and suggestions for enhanced note-taking productivity.
description: A revolutionary note-taking application that uses computer vision and AI to analyze handwritten notes in real-time. The app provides contextual suggestions, auto-completion, and smart organization features to enhance the traditional pen-and-paper experience.
challenges: Optimizing ML models for real-time performance

title: Task Management Dashboard
summary: A modern, responsive task management application with team collaboration features and real-time updates.
description: A comprehensive task management solution built for modern teams. Features include drag-and-drop kanban boards, real-time collaboration, advanced filtering, and detailed analytics to help teams stay organized and productive.

title: Weather Visualization App

description: An elegant weather application that transforms complex meteorological data into beautiful, interactive visualizations. Users can explore weather patterns, view detailed forecasts, and analyze historical trends through intuitive charts and maps.
